commit.message: Add DAO methods for handling token limits
Code review changes + DAO method should delete LRU token

nodes.bodyText:
instead of
" AND lastUsed > threshold ORDER BY  lastUsed ASC LIMIT 1"
what do you think of
"ORDER BY lastUsed DESC OFFSET 100"
(where 100 is just an example of the number of tokens you want to retain).
I.e. this deletes all but the most recent 100 tokens.  It has three advantages:
(1) You don't need to know the count before executing the query;
(2) There is no 'race condition' in which you check the count and then it changes (a token expires) just before you run the delete query;
(3) It cleans up old, expired tokens.
Essentially the operation is idempotent.  It just cleans up all but the most recent 100 tokens.

nodes.bodyText: I don't think you need AND COL_OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_LAST_USED > (NOW() - INTERVAL : PARAM_DAYS DAY).  If you omit it then this SQL guarantees that it never leaves more than PARAM_MAX_NUM_TOKENS for a user+client.  If you include it then while you clean up excessive, unexpired tokens, any expired ones will just linger forever.
